title: tikv crash for the warmup range should still be valid
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
```

[2023/08/04 19:19:34.207 +08:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:93] ["Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)"]
[2023/08/04 19:19:34.207 +08:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:93] ["Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure"]
[2023/08/04 19:19:34.207 +08:00] [INFO] [lib.rs:93] ["Profile:           dist_release"]
```
execution 1861294
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
disk full test
